item.title: Bridges in whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
1) does bridges like obfs4 work properly within latest whonix?
Yes. For obfs4, wait for Whonix 11. [Release announcement most likely later today.]
2) is it just like configuring normally within the tbb?
No, unfortunately not.

Bridges in Whonix have to be configured on Whonix-Gateway. Manually. Using /etc/tor/torrc. Not using TBB.

  • you donâ€™t have tor-launcher (= https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser#tor-launcher_vs_torbrowser-launcher) available
  • you cannot use the pluggable transports that come with TBB

See https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Bridges.

is it true bridges are more vulnerable to attacks and user profiling than normal entry guards?
A general Tor question. Please see this discussion (linked from Whonix https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Bridges documentation) but copied here for your convenience: https://lists.torproject.org/pipermail/tor-talk/2012-May/024369.html
